text: Nɨ gan! Kɨ Ikiavɨra Itir God, kɨ datɨrɨghɨn nɨ mɨgei, nɨ deraghvɨram oragh. Kɨ datɨrɨghɨn notɨn itir kantribar atrivibar diaghtɨ, me uan mɨdorozir gumaziba ko izam. Eghtɨ atrivir kaba izɨ uan atrivir dabirabiba Jerusalemɨn tiar akabar boroghɨn dar afegham. Egh me nguibar ekiam aghuizir dɨvazir gavgaviba akararigham. Egh me uaghan Judan nguibar igharaziba kamaghɨra dar amuam.
